sentences.en: Fishermen fear valuable oyster and mussel beds could be decimated.
sentences.cn: 渔民们害怕宝贵的牡蛎和贻贝层会被破坏。

sentences.en: Guests should leave their valuables in the hotel safe.
sentences.cn: 客人应把贵重物品存放在酒店保险柜中。

sentences.en: It is not unknown for valuable display items to go, ahem, missing.
sentences.cn: 贵重的展品，呃哼，丢失的话，会众人皆知。

sentences.en: Life has a value only when it has something valuable as its object.
sentences.cn: 目标有价值，生活才有价值。(黑格尔)

sentences.en: Many of our teachers also have valuable academic links with Heidelberg University.
sentences.cn: 我们的很多老师也和海德堡大学保持着有益的学术联系。

sentences.en: Muriel has made a valuable contribution to our company’s success.
sentences.cn: 缪里尔为我们公司的成功做出了宝贵的贡献。

sentences.en: Put away any valuable or breakable objects.
sentences.cn: 把所有值钱的东西和易碎的物品都收起来。

sentences.en: The book provides valuable information on recent trends.
sentences.cn: 此书就近来的发展趋势提供了宝贵的信息。

sentences.en: The church has several valuable works of art.
sentences.cn: 教堂有几件珍贵的艺术品。

sentences.en: The festival remains a valuable showcase for new talent.
sentences.cn: 音乐节一直是新秀展示才华的宝贵机会。

sentences.en: The golden rule is never to clean a valuable coin.
sentences.cn: 重要的原则是决不清除贵重硬币上的污垢。

sentences.en: The most valuable item on show will be a Picasso drawing.
sentences.cn: 展览会上最贵重的展品是毕加索的一幅素描。

sentences.en: The Romantics believed that the life of the imagination was intrinsically valuable.
sentences.cn: 浪漫主义作家认为想像的生命力本身就很重要.

sentences.en: Their most valuable belongings were locked in a safe in the bedroom.
sentences.cn: 他们最值钱的财物锁在卧室保险箱里。

sentences.en: These crustaceans provide a valuable food source for some fish.
sentences.cn: 这些甲壳纲动物是某些鱼类重要的食物来源.

sentences.en: This is one of the most valuable lessons I learned.
sentences.cn: 这是我所学到的最宝贵的教训.

sentences.en: Your life is too valuable to throw away.
sentences.cn: 你的生命非常宝贵，不要随便浪费。

words.tran_cn: 重要的；宝贵的；贵重的；经估价的
无价值的；不值钱的；微不足道的
值；价值；价格；重要性；确切涵义
评价者；估价者；价格核定人
昂贵的,珍贵的,绝妙的,奢侈的,无比的,非凡的

phrases.tran_cn: 最有价值球员；最优秀选手
n. 与受益价值相等的回报

trans.tran_cn: 有价值的，宝贵的，贵重的，值钱的
